post.title: ** fs: bnib rogers htc dream (black) in richmond hill - sealed in box!! $325 **
post.content: call me at 1-416-669-9111 or pm me to reach my blackberry instantly. received through rogers retentions yesterday however i already have a phone so this one is up for sale. proof of purchase will be supplied to you for a full 1-yr warranty. if this ad is still here the phone is still available. willing to meet anywhere in richmond hill/markham/newmarket area or downtown if during the week. still sealed in box: happy shopping!
